title: WebSocket Integration
description: SUPREME BROADCASTER (v365): Optimized WebSocket and SSE metrics injection via centralized singleton broadcaster. Achieved feature parity for SSE with periodic health metrics. Verified with 84 tests passing.
result: v365 SUPREME BROADCASTER COMPLETE: https://github.com/ilteris/adk-progress-bridge/pull/279 | Optimized metrics injection and enabled SSE parity. Final Audit: tasks/websocket_audit_report_jan31_v365_supreme_broadcaster.md

history.message: v365 SUPREME BROADCASTER FINALIZED: Implemented BroadcastMetricsManager. Enabled SSE periodic metrics. All 84 tests passing.
v364 SUPREME REFINEMENT FINALIZED: Implemented background metrics pusher in run_ws_generator. Fixed TaskMonitor.vue registry metric. All 61 tests passing.
v363 SUPREME AUDIT FINALIZED: Re-verified entire system in fresh session. All 44 WS tests passed. Updated versioning to 1.6.3 and sync'd SPEC.md. PR #277 ready.
